text: Is there a standard way to allow for customizing how an object is displayed on a per-call basis? E.g. `DataFrames.jl` has keyword arguments added to the `show(::IO, ::DataFrame)` method to control truncation of rows and columns, but this a) isn't strictly part of the `Base.show` API and b) doesn't work through `display`.
